response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a great addition to your collection or business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at an attractive price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we hope this offer aligns with your expectations and allows us to mutually benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
